update dd_hrm_data_sign
dd_user_id = #{ddUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dd_job_number = #{ddJobNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dd_name = #{ddName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dd_position = #{ddPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dd_sex_type = #{ddSexType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dd_birth_time = #{ddBirthTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dd_cert_address = #{ddCertAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dd_address = #{ddAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dd_cert_no = #{ddCertNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
dd_mobile = #{ddMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dd_work_city = #{ddWorkCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dd_now_contract_start_time = #{ddNowContractStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dd_now_contract_end_time = #{ddNowContractEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dd_probation_period_type = #{ddProbationPeriodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

dd_ts_excl_flag = #{ddTsExclFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
job_status = #{jobStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
and dd_job_number = #{ddJobNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select dd_user_id, dd_job_number, dd_name, dd_position, dd_sex_type, dd_birth_time, dd_cert_address, dd_address, dd_cert_no, dd_mobile, dd_work_city, dd_now_contract_start_time, dd_now_contract_end_time, dd_probation_period_type, dd_regular_time, dd_confirm_join_time, dd_graduate_school, dd_email, dd_bank_account_no, dd_account_bank, dd_main_dept_id, dd_main_dept, dd_company_name, dd_ts_excl_flag, job_status, create_time from dd_hrm_data_sign where dd_job_number = #{ddJobNumber}
